patthana24.20:1.1: Naaraṇaṃ naāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saraṇo āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana24.20:3.1: Naaraṇaṃ nasaññojanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saraṇo saññojano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.
patthana24.20:4.1: Naaraṇaṃ naganthaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saraṇo gantho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana24.20:6.1: Naaraṇaṃ naoghaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saraṇo ogho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana24.20:8.1: Naaraṇaṃ noyogaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saraṇo yogo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana24.20:10.1: Naaraṇaṃ nanīvaraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saraṇo nīvaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana24.20:12.1: Naaraṇaṃ naparāmāsaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saraṇo parāmāso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
